data.message: What a wonderful idea😍Thank you for giving back, but most of all for your kind loving heart Rex. I hope you can reach more places. Thank you Thank you! #GivingTuesday ..  This made me think of you  #Fight2Feed for the hard work and continue  missions to feed our homeless in Chicago. Jiwon, let's work on getting the food mobile😀you have started a great movement and are such an inspiration. Im grateful that through Fight2Feed and my good friend Nicole, I was able to give back and meet such beautiful kind loving people. May we continue to grow🙏and make this world a better place.

replies.message: What lovely post Carmen Godinez Diaz!!  Love you my friend.,  We need a million more of yous!!  XOX
Spread the word, here is a link for Rex's fundraiser: https://www.gofundme.com/3gct86f6
